name: Anime Download and Upload Bot
description: A bot that fetches anime from RSS feed, downloads torrents, and uploads to Telegram.

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: Owner ID to restrict bot usage

API_ID.description: Your API ID, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your API hash, take it from my.telegram.org

RSS_FEED_URL.description: The RSS feed URL to fetch anime from

DOWNLOAD_PATH.description: Path where downloaded anime will be stored

CHECK_INTERVAL.description: How often the bot checks for new RSS entries (in seconds)

ADMINS.description: A space-separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can manage the bot.
